description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Stunning slideshow of over 250 photos of London, Rome, New York, Paris, Sydney and Los Angeles. Featuring 15 transitions, a clock and special effects, this is the perfect app to run whilst listening to music through the Xbox Dashboard.
description.short: Stunning slideshow of over 250 photos of London, Rome, New York, Paris, Sydney and Los Angeles. Featuring 15 transitions, a clock and special effects, this is the perfect app to run whilst listening to music through the Xbox Dashboard.
